sentences.en: A lot of farm tools are piled in the storehouse.
sentences.cn: 库房里堆放着许多农具.

sentences.en: Because of the depressed market, the company's storehouse is completely packed.
sentences.cn: 由于市场萧条, 公司的库房已经胀库了.

sentences.en: Builds five city civic building relocation estimate organization alternative storehouse.
sentences.cn: 建立五城区城市房屋拆迁估价机构备选库.

sentences.en: Contraband goods were found in the storehouse of the hotel.
sentences.cn: 在旅馆的储藏室里发现了走私货.

sentences.en: He suddenly cried out that the storehouse was on fire.
sentences.cn: 他突然叫道仓库着火了.

sentences.en: It is comforting to have a storehouse of treasured memories.
sentences.cn: 拥有一座藏满了珍贵记忆的宝库真是令人欣慰。

sentences.en: Its vast storehouse of natural resources became apparent to all.
sentences.cn: 大家都看到了它广大自然资源的宝藏.

sentences.en: Language is a storehouse of soundimages, and writing is tangible form of those images.
sentences.cn: 语言既然是音响形象的堆栈, 文字就是这些形象的可以捉摸的形式.

sentences.en: Provisions were kept in the storehouse.
The local archives service offers a storehouse of material.
sentences.cn: 当地的档案馆提供大量的资料。

sentences.en: The police hasn't found out who set fire to the storehouse.
sentences.cn: 警方还没查出是谁放火烧了仓库.

sentences.en: The sea is the world's greatest storehouse of raw materials.
sentences.cn: 海洋是世界上最大的原料宝库.

sentences.en: The storehouse is under the care of Old Wang.
The storehouse is under the care of Old Wu.
This book is a veritable storehouse of information.
sentences.cn: 这本书是名副其实的信息宝库。

words.tran_cn: 店主；仓库管理员；零售店店主

trans.tran_cn: 仓库，货栈，知识宝库，知识丰富的人
trans.tran_en: something that contains a lot of information etc
